title: Lags after windows 10 update

replies.body: I know how to fix it, I wrote a discussion on it, its on my profile{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Sometimes an update may require an update of drivers to restore stability, but there could be other issues causing fps problems like bad game files.  I suggest going over the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide, and each step there to shape up your PC.  Let me know if you have any questions!
